text: Rayman is a 2D platform video game developed by Ubisoft for Atari Jaguar, PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and Sega Saturn on 1995, PC (MS-DOS) on 1996, Game Boy Color on 2000, Game Boy Advance on 2001, Nintendo DSi on 2009, Nintendo 3DS for virtual console on 2012, and finally IOS and Android on 2016 with the name of Rayman Classic, on October of 2018 the game appears on the 20 games of Playstation Classic. == Development == The game was created by a french designer called Michel Ancel with the programmer Frédéric Houde and the artist Alexandra Steible, the first designs was produced in the 1980's on there teenage. == References == Category:1995 video games Category:Rayman Category:Ubisoft games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Atari Jaguar games Category:DOS games Category:DSiWare games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Game Boy Color games Category:IOS games Category:PlayStation games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Sega Saturn games Category:Side- scrolling platform games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about dreams Category:Virtual Console games Category:Windows games
title: Rayman (video game)
